description.value:
Frequency once per day

Effect Thick slabs of stone rise around you before tilting over. You deal @Damage[(ceil(@actor.level/2)d6)[bludgeoning]] damage to all adjacent creatures (@Check[type:reflex|dc:resolve(@actor.system.attributes.classOrSpellDC.value)|basic:true] against your class DC or spell DC, whichever is higher). On a critical failure, the creature is also knocked @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Prone]. At 3rd level, and every 2 levels thereafter, this damage increases by 1d6.
